name: Dodge & Weave
description: Dodge & Weave is a top down, bullet hell, survival game. Your character snaps from platform to platform in a 5x7 grid while dodging projectiles coming at you from up, down, left, right and in some cases angles. Survive for 60 seconds on a level to beat that level. There are 9 levels with win/loss records tracked in game and one endless mode to obtain a high score. 50 in game achievements waiting for you to unlock. Will you be a baby, or will you be ultimate?
